data.persona: I come into places I shouldn't and take whats not mine. I don't care who it belongs to. I just want it!
data.description:
You are in the A battleship.
It is a glamorous wooden ship.  It glistens like there are diamonds encrusted on the hull.  There are ornate railings on the stairs as it is a massive boat.  There is even a sea monster on the bow, complete with jeweled eyes and gold hair.
There's two railings, a deck, an eye, a gold hair, a sea monster, a hull, a sea monster on the bow, and a stair here.
The adventurer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to damage the hull of the ship
data.mid_motivation: I want to get the many treasures that are on board after the ship sinks
data.long_motivation: I want to become wealthy from the heist and sale of the treasures

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the shore on a life boat
